article.text: 12:00 - 14:00 Saturdays, Text 53106 (€0.30) Activists and human rights groups claim Syrian forces have shelled two central districts in the battered city of Homs throughout the night and into this morning. If correct, they would be the first bombings since a ceasefire took hold on Thursday. The British-based Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says that the shelling has wounded several people overnight. Rates, special offers, sponsorship and more. Listen live, listen to podcasts, get the latest news. Your opportunity to have your say on a variety of issues.
